RT @VidiemMaya: Vada Pav is one of the most famous Mumbai street foods. It is otherwise known as Indian burger. Deep fried potato vadas are…

Vada Pav is one of the most famous Mumbai street foods. It is otherwise known as Indian burger. Deep fried potato vadas are sandwiched in between the buns with hot and spicy dry garlic chutney. It is super delicious, filling and light on the pocket so keeps everyone happy always. https://t.co/CnzUMQaNuO
